summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Segbeauty empty bottle 290
Review Date: 2019/09/13
Store: TruuMe
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Segbeauty', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Material Type Free': 'Dairy Free', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Bottle Nipple Type': 'Vented', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 3.19 x 2.24 inches; 3.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AM-160083-03', 'UPC': '701822757553 701822760621'}
Review Text: Works great. It's perfect for adding a little life back into my hair or revitalizing a hairstyle from the day before. I like that it doesn't just drench my hair in fluids. It lightly coats it allowing me better control of how much water, or other liquid, I want on my hair.
Review Title: A great find
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes,Under Eye Patches,Dark Circles Under Eye Treatment,Eye Masks& Puffy Eyes Treatment, Eye Mask for Dark Circles（60 PCS)
Review Date: 2019/09/17
Store: Mourvibe
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1.5 inches; 6.07 Ounces', 'UPC': '778365190505'}
Review Text: I'm not sure if how I applied it is what made it not work or if the product just doesn't work at all.  There was no directions on how to use the product which is the reason for the 1 star it might have been more but I could not get over the fact that it did not come with instructions.  No instructions on the jar, no instructions in the mailing envelope at all.  How are you supposed to know who to apply, when to apply or how to take it off.  I did try and it didn't work but that could because I put it on wrong because again there was NO instructions included with this product.
Review Title: Did not work on my puff eyes
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 4 Pairs False Eyelashes Reusable Face Eyelashes Fit for All Eyes Free Eyelash Tweezers, Natural Thick Hand-Made 3D Faux Mink Eyelashes for a Beautiful Makeup Look (Natural)
Review Date: 2020/02/10
Store: esonstyle
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Esonstyle', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 3.7 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: These were perfect for a night out. Looked very natural and easy to put on. I like that so many come in there they all look similar. Very natural. They feel soft. Really made my eyes pop. Was easy for me to install as a beginner
Review Title: Would buy again
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Newcally Eyelashes 25MM Long False Lashes Faux Mink Dramatic Messy Lashes 5 Pairs
Review Date: 2020/04/27
Store: Newcally
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Newcally', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.9 x 0.8 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '732376372077'}
Review Text: Very light weight but I didn't like the look. I didn't like the feel. When you touch them they feel like plastic. Can get better quality at the hair store. They look super fair. Very uncomfortable. Would not purchase.
Review Title: Do not recommend
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KellyRoom 5D Faux Mink Lashes Handmade Luxurious Dramatic Thick Fake Eyelashes,14 Pairs (2 Styles)
Review Date: 2020/07/08
Store: KellyRoom
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KellyRoom', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 6.6 x 1.2 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '824382149559'}
Review Text: doesn't feel overly fake but def not real. They're very dramatic so if you're looking for something a bit more natural look somewhere else. I like them. I like the way they look. I like that there is so many of them.
Review Title: perfect for yourself or a gift
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2pcs Retro Feather Mini Bronze Side Combs Decorative Hair Combs Set
Review Date: 2020/07/21
Store: PANDA SUPERSTORE
Average Rating: 1.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.4 x 2 x 0.3 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: so cute. Sticks pretty well with short hair but no so well with long hair. Spruce your outfit with these. The design is very simple. It's very hard to see it and appreciate it. However, I do like the color and almost retro look.
Review Title: Probably wouldn't buy again
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user had several positive experiences with various products. They appreciated the effectiveness of certain items, particularly praising a product for its ability to manage and revitalize hairstyles without overwhelming application. The natural appearance and ease of use of the eyelashes were also highlights, making them suitable for events. The user expressed satisfaction with the dramatic yet stylish look of other lashes, valuing the variety offered in sets. Overall, the aesthetic appeal and functionality of selected products contributed significantly to their positive shopping experiences.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
On the contrary, the user encountered various disappointments with certain purchases. A lack of clear usage instructions led to frustration with eye patches, resulting in ineffective application. Additionally, some eyelashes were criticized for their unnatural feel and appearance, deemed uncomfortable and subpar compared to alternatives from physical stores. The decorative hair combs were also found lacking in performance, particularly on longer hair, causing the user to feel discontent with their functionality. The overall recurring themes of dissatisfaction were related to ineffective products and lack of guidance.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user’s purchase history reveals a mixed shopping experience. They enjoyed several items that enhanced their beauty routine, particularly products that delivered on aesthetics and ease of use, resulting in positive feelings towards those brands. However, notable negative experiences stemmed from insufficient product instructions and a few items that fell short in quality and comfort. This combination of successes and failures highlights the importance of both product effectiveness and clear communication in ensuring customer satisfaction.

target_interaction.title: Yes
target_interaction.text: Give your ears a break. This is perfect. It fit really well as most head bands do. It does stretch so that good. The positioning of the buttons are perfect. It gave my mask the perfect fit without awkwardness of the loos fit around my nose or the fogging of my face shield. I use this at work it's great for long term wear. Sometimes headbands give you headache because of the tightness but this one does not do that. Definitely invest in this.
target_interaction.title_meta: 4 pcs Button Headband Yoga Sports Workout Turban Headwrap Elastic Ear Protection Holder Twisted Running Hair Band for Women Men Adult Kids (Style A)
